fullbody.description: A complete full-body workout to strengthen muscles and burn fat.
fullbody.workout:
Set 01.
      - Burpees: 12 reps
      - Mountain Climbers: 20 reps
      - Squat Jumps: 15 reps
      - Push-Ups: 10 reps
      - Plank with Shoulder Taps: 16 reps (8 each side)

lowerbody.description: This workout targets your lower body, including legs and glutes.
lowerbody.workout:
Set 01.
      - Squats: 15 reps
      - Lunges: 12 reps per leg
      - Glute Bridges: 20 reps
      - Calf Raises: 15 reps
      - Step-Ups: 10 reps per leg

abs.description: Improve core strength with this effective ab routine.
abs.workout:
Set 01.
      - Crunches: 20 reps
      - Leg Raises: 15 reps
      - Russian Twists: 20 reps (10 each side)
      - Plank Hold: 30 seconds
      - Bicycle Crunches: 20 reps

upperbody.description: A workout focused on your arms, chest, and shoulders.
upperbody.workout:
Set 01.
      - Push-Ups: 12 reps
      - Tricep Dips: 15 reps
      - Shoulder Press: 10 reps
      - Bicep Curls: 12 reps
      - Plank to Push-Up: 10 reps

stretch.description: A cool-down routine to improve flexibility and reduce muscle soreness.
stretch.workout:
Set 01.
      - Hamstring Stretch: 30 seconds per leg
      - Quad Stretch: 30 seconds per leg
      - Shoulder Stretch: 30 seconds per side
      - Cat-Cow Stretch: 30 seconds
      - Child's Pose: 30 seconds
